metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3878 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: none.  Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA.  Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue.  Notes: none.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream claims this isn't a vulnerability

criterions.comment: perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
